Articles.Content: I've installed KSP 1.3.1 and started updating my modpack with ckan but infernal robotics didn't work, even when I install it manually it didn't work.

On 12/10/2017 at 6:22 PM, miramars said:

I've installed KSP 1.3.1 and started updating my modpack with ckan but infernal robotics didn't work, even when I install it manually it didn't work.

Hi i don't believe you can install IR using CKAN as you need various downloads to complete the package , i suggest you find the Infernal robotics thread and there you'll find a guide on how to properly install the mod.  For ref it works very well in 1.3.1 when properly installed
